For Certain duration of time apply:
Max MP + 20%
HP Recovery Bonus + 20%
M. Critical Rate +20
Critical Damage during a
normal attack + 20%
P. Attack + 10%
P. Defence + 20%
Atk. Speed + 20%
M. Attack + 20%
M. Defence + 20%
Casting Speed + 20%
Debuff Resistance + 10%
And damage received from
critical attacks - 30%
Bonus:
Players equipped with
male weapons
Bow/Crossbows have increased
Critical Damage after receiving an
amount of damage.
